title: Flag of Hungary
cardDescription: The flag of Hungary is a horizontal tricolor of red, white and green.
description: The flag of Hungary is a horizontal tricolor of red, white and green. It has been the official flag of Hungary since October 1, 1957. The flagâ€™s form originates from national republican movements of the 18th and 19th centuries, while its colors are from the Middle Ages.

content.content: Take care when choosing the green yarn to use since it should not be too bright. Rather a little darker and more pale shade of green.
This pattern is worked horizontally starting from top left.
